Tree.name: Tree1
Tree.sub-title: Three Leaf cover, Symbolizes good luck and fortune in many cultures
Tree.title: Plant Care Guide
Tree.Water: Allow the soil to dry out completely before watering
Tree.Tips: Gently insert a toothpick into the soil to determine if your plant needs watering
Tree.Description: A caudicform plant with reddish and green leaves. Interestingly, the leaves fold up in pairs during the evening, keep away from children and pets.
Tree.sub-desc: Plant images are solely for illustration purposes only

Tree.name: Tree2
Tree.sub-title: Broad Leaf cover, Symbolizes growth and renewal
Tree.title: Plant Care Guide
Tree.Water: Water when the top inch of soil is dry
Tree.Tips: Regularly check for pests and diseases
Tree.Description: A vibrant green plant with large leaves. It thrives in warm environments and needs moderate watering.
Tree.sub-desc: Plant images are for demonstration only

Tree.name: Tree3
Tree.sub-title: Heart-shaped leaves, Represents love and affection
Tree.title: Plant Care Guide
Tree.Water: Water once a week and keep the soil moist
Tree.Tips: Avoid waterlogging to prevent root rot
Tree.Description: A compact plant with heart-shaped leaves that add a touch of romance to any space.
Tree.sub-desc: Images shown are representative only

Tree.name: Tree4
Tree.sub-title: Evergreen foliage, Symbolizes endurance and longevity
Tree.title: Plant Care Guide
Tree.Water: Allow the topsoil to dry between waterings
Tree.Tips: Fertilize every 2-3 months during growing season
Tree.Description: A hardy plant known for its resilience and longevity. Prefers stable environmental conditions.
Tree.sub-desc: Images are for illustration purposes only

Tree.name: Tree5
Tree.sub-title: Tropical leaves, Symbolizes peace and tranquility

Tree.Tips: Mist the leaves to maintain humidity
Tree.Description: A lush, tropical plant that adds a sense of calm to any room.

Tree.name: Tree6

Tree.name: Tree7
